msg: Added a short comment about the optional module Time::HiRes and what its used for.

author: felicity
msg: The MIME parser would miss the last header in a message.  Fixed. :)

author: felicity
msg: bug 2140: eudora sometimes has a different message-id than we expected
before, so account for those differences.

author: felicity
msg: bug 2140: Eudora sometimes has a slightly different format for Message-ID,
so we should deal with those to avoid FPs.
